text: Big School-Break () is a 1972 Soviet movie directed by Aleksei Korenev.Работал в ресторане, на фабрике. Как советский актер прописался в ГолливудеБОЛЬШАЯ ПЕРЕМЕНА (1972-1973) It stars Mikhail Kononov, Yevgeny Leonov, and Rolan Bykov. == Actors == * Mikhail Kononov as Nestor Petrovich Severov, the history teacher * Yevgeny Leonov as Stepan Lednyov * Rolan Bykov as Alexander Petrykin * Aleksandr Zbruyev as Grigory Ganzha * Svetlana Kryuchkova as Nelli * Yanis Yakobson as Nelli neighbor's party * Yuriy Kuzmenkov as Fedoskin * Natalya Bogunova as Svetlana Afanasyevna * Natalya Gvozdikova as Polina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1972 movies
title: Big School-Break
